questions.a: Our AI analyzes over 2,000 vehicle listings in real time to find the best opportunities based on your criteria. We compare prices, history, features, and financing terms to ensure you get the best deal.

questions.q: How much does your service cost?
questions.a: Our analysis and comparison service is completely free! We only earn a commission if you make a purchase through one of our recommendations, paid by the seller.
All recommended vehicles are inspected and certified. We check the complete history, technical and administrative condition. You also benefit from a minimum 6-month warranty on all used vehicles.

questions.q: How long does the analysis take?
questions.a: Our AI performs the analysis in real time, in under one minute. You will then receive a detailed report by email within 24 hours, including the best personalized offers and a 5-year savings simulation.

questions.q: In which regions are you available?
questions.a: We cover all of mainland France. Our network includes over 1,500 partner dealerships and resellers, ensuring you can find the ideal vehicle near you.

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn how we protect your personal data

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: At Auto √âco Expert, we place the utmost importance on protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service.

sections.title: Data Collected
sections.content:
We collect the following information:
- Personal information (name, email, phone)
- Vehicle preferences
- Browsing data on our site
- Technical information (IP address, browser type)

sections.title: Use of Data
sections.content:
Your data is used to:
- Personalize your vehicle search
- Send you relevant offers
- Improve our services
- Comply with our legal obligations

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content:
You have the following rights:
- Access to your data
- Correction of inaccurate data
- Deletion of your data
- Objection to processing
- Data portability

meta.title: Terms of Use
meta.description: View our general terms of use

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By using our service, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

sections.title: Service Description
sections.content: Auto √âco Expert is a platform for comparing automotive offers. We use artificial intelligence to help you find the best deals.

sections.title: Responsibilities
sections.content: Auto √âco Expert acts as an intermediary and cannot be held responsible for final transactions between you and sellers. We strive to provide accurate information but do not guarantee complete accuracy.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content on our site (texts, images, logos) is protected by copyright and remains our exclusive property.

meta.title: Cookie Policy
meta.description: Understand how cookies are used on our site

sections.title: What is a cookie?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that allow us to enhance your experience on our site.

sections.title: Types of Cookies Used
sections.content:
We use the following types of cookies:
- Essential cookies: necessary for the functioning of the site
- Analytics cookies: to understand how the site is used
- Preference cookies: to remember your choices
- Marketing cookies: to personalize advertisements

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies already on your device and set most browsers to block them.

meta.title: GDPR Compliance
meta.description: Our commitment to data protection under GDPR

sections.title: Legal Basis
sections.content:
We process your personal data on the following legal bases:
- Your consent
- Execution of a contract
- Our legal obligations
- Our legitimate interests

sections.title: Your GDPR Rights
sections.content:
In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
- Right of access
- Right to rectification
- Right to erasure
- Right to restriction of processing
- Right to data portability
- Right to object

sections.title: Data Transfers
sections.content: Your data is hosted exclusively within the European Union. We do not transfer your personal data outside the EU without appropriate safeguards.

sections.title: Data Protection Officer
sections.content: For any questions regarding the processing of your personal data, you can contact our DPO at: dpo@auto-eco-expert.fr
